name: Ken Steven
what_you_do: The IMPACT Sales Podcast, hosted by Joe Beck, focuses on uncovering secrets, sharing success stories, and unpacking strategies that enable sales professionals to impact the world.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves individuals in the sales industry, including sales professionals and entrepreneurs looking to enhance their sales skills and strategies.
business_focus: The IMPACT Sales Podcast, hosted by Joe Beck, focuses on uncovering secrets, sharing success stories, and unpacking strategies that enable sales professionals to impact the world.
